column5: Any reports from Minnitaki? Any info on water level in channel to/from Butterfly Lake? Going up Fri 23 June, will post my report when I get back. Thanks. RSH8

Just got back from Minnitaki. Spent a week at Donnelly's. Saw a lot of suspended fish. Biggest walleye was 25.5". Due to the cooler temps, we caught a lot of fish in 12' or less. Water levels seemed fine to me, but I am no expert. I have not been to Butterfly Lake, so I can't comment on that. We usually stay in the arm and go to Lyons Bay and surrounding areas. We were too early to go to Red Pine and Southwest Bays this year.Hope this helps!Sportfisher
